memberdef.name: VERIFY_TRUE
memberdef.initializer: if ((res) != true) { \ LOG_ERR(Logger, LOG_LEVEL, message); \ throw std::runtime_error(message); \ }

memberdef.name: VERIFY_OPT
memberdef.initializer: if (!(res)) { \ LOG_ERR(Logger, LOG_LEVEL, message); \ throw std::runtime_error(message); \ }

memberdef.name: FAIL_IF
memberdef.initializer: if ((res)) { \ LOG_ERR(Logger, LOG_LEVEL, message); \ throw std::runtime_error(message); \ }
